casebody.data:
Betty Jo O'NEAL
v.
Jeffrey Hunter FOX and Lisa Polley Fox No. 138P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Brenton D. Adams, Attorney at Law, Gregory A. Posch, Attorney at Law, Betty Jo O'Neal, for O'Neal, Betty Jo. Kristie L. Hedrick, Raleigh, M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Fox, Jeffrey Hunter, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of May 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2018 by Plaintiff for Leave to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
